title: Ghosts of Glass
description: Sam was a writer of children's books that told of a far away land which was made of glass. What he doesn't realize is that these stories are inspired from a magic world he entered as a child. Now his life, the life of a serial killer, a man searching for a mystical object, and a poet whose job it is to make hearts all find their destinies intertwined in a world with Ghosts of Glass.
author: Christopher St. John Sampayo
